price: (80) And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions,[826] and he will come to Us alone.
footnotes: [826]- Instead of giving him wealth and children in the Hereafter, Allāh will take from him those he had in worldly life at the time of his death.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

translations: and he will come to Us
